page.title: 05Meriden-Ecology.
page.content:
Meriden lies in Green Belt land between Coventry and Birmingham, and the area represents a buffer between these rapidly expanding urban areas.
The village lies in the centre of a beautiful tract of typical Warwickshire countryside of fields,ponds and woodland. The high ground which surrounds the village on the north and south sides gives extensive views of the surrounding countryside, so the area is very popular with walkers and ramblers and there are many waymarked footpaths.
The countryside is full of a great variety of wildlife, both animal and plant variety.
